en.content: You squint into the darkness behind the bookcase. It is a small alcove, big enough for one person, and has a hidden shelf on either side. You cannot make out any titles in this light

zh.content: 你侧身挤进书架后面的暗室。这是个小小的壁龛，大小仅容一人，两边各有一个隐蔽的书架。这种亮度下你没办法看清书名。

text.en: Risk opening one of the cliffside windows a little
text.zh: 冒险把悬崖边的窗户打开一点点

text.en: Grab a few books and leave
